images.placeholders: Use abstract CSS geometric shapes (circles, grids) in soft slate/blue colors for product cards.

motion.instructions: Use staggered fades for lists. Smooth 'y' axis lifts (y: 20 -> y: 0). No excessive bouncing. Duration: 0.6s, Ease: 'easeOut'.

home: Hero: Headline 'Smart connected technology for everyday life'. Split layout with Abstract Image.
Features: 3 Product Pillars (Hardware, Software, Sustainability) in Bento Grid.
Highlights: 'Why Xtrec' section with large typography.
products: List of products with abstract geometric visualizations.
contact: Clean Layout: Form on left, Contact Info on right.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Do NOT use dark mode. Keep it strictly Light Mode.
Ensure 'Deep Blue' is used only for primary actions and key accents.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the frontend using React + Tailwind. Use the provided colors and fonts. Create the 'design_system' components first (Button, Typography, Card). Ensure the layout is responsive and minimal.
